"""Context processors for Page CMS."""

from pages import settings

 

def media(request):

    """Adds media-related context variables to the context."""

    return {

        'PAGES_MEDIA_URL': settings.PAGES_MEDIA_URL,

        'PAGE_USE_SITE_ID': settings.PAGE_USE_SITE_ID

    }
